thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 3 of 1898
thread.title: Heide

author: Heide
title: Heide
text:
Everything worked very well and the prices were as indicated. But ONLY if you very carefully read the fine print, made sure to opt out of the insurance options, AND did not check that your preference was to sit together with your traveller. That automatically gave you an extra charge for seat selection without you really being aware of it. I was caught unawares and so was my daughter who had made a different booking. It almost seemed that the site tried to trip you up with this, but I'm not sure what benefit it would be to them.
I would definitely use FlightHub again.
